oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 004
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Auguste Burnand
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 004. Vue de la ferme Chavannes & de ses environs prise du ridge, cote Nord 1855. View of the Chavannes farm and vicinity taken from the north side of the ridge, 1855. Note two dogs at base of tree looking at treed animal; man with rifle at right. From the Swiss American Sketchbook with drawings by French-Swiss traveling artist Auguste Burnand (ca. 1835-ca. 1860?). He lived in the Swiss American community near Knoxville, TN, from 1853-1860.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drawings; Farms; Hunting; Dogs; Views;
